regulations.title: Clause 4.2 Fire Alarm Systems
regulations.html_body:
Clause 4.2 Fire Alarm Systems

Each residential unit must install interconnected smoke detectors capable of alerting adjacent units.

The alarm system shall comply with the latest SS 645 standard.

regulations.title: Clause 5.1 Emergency Lighting
regulations.html_body:
Clause 5.1 Emergency Lighting

Maintain emergency lighting for a minimum duration of 60 minutes during evacuation scenarios.
